Microwave Mug Cake

Ingredients

4 tbsp flour
4 tbsp sugar
2 tbsp cocoa powder
1 egg
3 tbsp milk
3 tbsp oil

How to Make It?

Mix all ingredients in a microwave-safe mug. Microwave for 1-2 minutes until cooked through.
